sections.heading: 2) Intros & Hand-Offs
sections.body: Introduce with name + role + anchor: **NOW INTRODUCE A-L-E-X, HOST BAND.** (point to stage anchor). Hand-off: **ALEX, FLOOR-YOU.** Step back, eyes to performer.

sections.body: Use **HOLD/WAIT** to pause; **CLARIFY-SHORT** for simple fixes (mic, lights, seating). Keep fixes â‰¤1â€“2 lines, then return to program with a **button line**: **READY? CONTINUE.**

sections.body: Confirm: **CAPTION-ON OK? INTERPRETER PROVIDED FRONT-RIGHT.** Offer seating: **NEED SEE-CLEAR? FRONT ROW AVAILABLE.**

sections.heading: 5) Partner Drill: Open â†’ Intro â†’ Close
sections.body: A plays Emcee: opener (timeâ†’topicâ†’housekeeping), intro a performer, then close with button line. B is audience and gives a one-line feedback on clarity. Swap roles.

sections.heading: 6) Button Lines (Closers)
sections.body: Keep closers short: **THAT FINISH. NEXT COMING.** / **THANK-YOU SUPPORT. BREAK 5 MIN. BACK 8:10.**

items.q: Best way to give the floor:
